channel.title: Need beta testers, Anyone can help
channel.description:
Title says all. Heres the info. I need as many beta testers as possible to make sure there is no bugs etc in the server.
Features:
1000x XP Rate Stable Economy Full Jad, start at 360's 255 Region Fix Anti Cheat Client No Dupes Curse Prayers Full Divine Spirit Shield Full Arcane Spirit Shield Full Elysian Spirit Shield Full Spectral Spirit Shield
100% Dragon Claws Active PK'ing "Lagg" Fixes Proper Item Switching Switching Tab (HP Bar, Hitmarks etc...) Switch Between Playing In 525 Or 317 Graphics Corporeal Beast Full Godwars (With Killcount Noway to Clip Into A Chamber) 24/7 With Rarely Any Downtime Or Lagg
RFD Minigame Warrior's Guild Steel & Iron Dragons Hill Giants Tormented Demons King Black Dragon Coinshare Lootshare
Staff of light (Real Effects and special attack) PvP Armors PvP Zones NPC Clipping Auto Donation Donator Zone Donator Tab Donator Items Chaotic Weapons & Armors
Summoning - Cats, Dogs, Penguin, Dragons [Dragons are donator only]
Perfect Leeching
Anims Flashing are fixed - hand cannon stance works without flashing
Alot Of Shops - Check Shop Picture
Good Bosses - Avatar Of Destruction and Penance Queen going to be added
Easy Training - ::pure command added
Chaos altar.
Have the option in the [P], Tab to buy armor sets and etc.
+MUCH MUCH MUCH MORE!
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/jt2d83.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/3007bwl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/29ekjr6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/1ymjom.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/1zxmryr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/27ydgrc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2iaa3xi.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/zxmfcz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/4uazoj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/iepchz.png[/img]
http://uppit.com/78yak4kiqvcp/Velocity-Scape_V4_Client.rar
http://uppit.com/78yak4kiqvcp/Velocity-Scape_V4_Client.rar
